message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
